value.halfverse: until I make your enemies your footstool.”
value.verse: The LORD said to my Lord, “Sit at my right hand, *

value.halfverse: saying, “Rule over your enemies round about you.
value.verse: The LORD will send the scepter of your power out of Zion, *
Princely state has been yours from the day of your birth; *
value.halfverse:
in the beauty of holiness have I begotten you,
 like dew from the womb of the morning.”
“You are a priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek.”
value.verse: The LORD has sworn and he will not recant: *

The Lord who is at your right hand
will smite kings in the day of his wrath; *
value.halfverse: he will rule over the nations.
he will smash heads over the wide earth.
value.verse: He will heap high the corpses; *

value.halfverse: therefore he will lift high his head.
value.verse: He will drink from the brook beside the road; *
